title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: Rinku is onto the fugitive’s whereabouts as the wedding ceremony starts again. Shashwat tries to contact Rishi. Teji surprises everyone with a change in stance. DSP Ghosh has a showdown with Rinku and Papaji.
